abstract: Neville Chamberlain, the director of National Service, spoke to members of the Stock Exchange about the campaign to end the war.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Mr. Neville Chamberlain, Director of National Service, yesterday made interesting declarations to the members of the Stock Exchange, to whom he appealed for co-operation with his effort. He said: —
snippet: Neville Chamberlain, the director of National Service, spoke to members of the Stock Exchange about the campaign to end the war....

headline.main: 1917: Chamberlain Says the War May Be Ended This Summer
